<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
INTERNATIONAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/hong-kong-officially-recession?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Hong Kong Is Officially in a Recession
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Hong Kong protestors " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcyNTU2MDM5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Anthony Kwan/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Five months of sustained protests will do that. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">An international commerce hub, Hong Kong was already <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/31/business/hong-kong-economy/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">feeling</a> the effects of the U.S.-China trade war and China's slowing economic growth. But months of anti-government protests compounded those problems, dragging the region's economy down 3.2% in the quarter spanning July to September. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Local businesses are hurting. </strong>Protesters have targeted and vandalized organizations they perceive as opposing their cause. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Bottomless dim sum baskets aren't boosting restaurant attendance. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Hotel occupancy dropped from 90%+ to around 66%. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>HK's Cathay Pacific Airways's inbound traffic </span><span><a href="https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Hong-Kong-protests/Protests-tip-Hong-Kong-into-official-recession-as-trade-war-stings?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nosedived</a></span><span> 38% in September.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Things won’t get better soon</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Economists <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/31/business/hong-kong-economy/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">predict</a> Hong Kong will fall short of growth targets for the year and face negative GDP growth in 2020 or earlier. But even if protests ended tomorrow, the consequences could stretch long after.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Take the yellow vest protests that ripped through France last holiday season. The worst impacts weren't </span><span><a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-france-protests/worst-of-yellow-vest-economic-impact-in-france-yet-to-come-senate-idUSKCN1TS1RX?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">expected</a></span><span> until the last few months of 2019 when supply chain and delayed tax bill disruptions finally hit. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In response, HK leader Carrie Lam has <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/hong-kong-protests-force-city-into-recession-with-no-recovery-in-sight-11572513397?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">committed</a> to billions in social welfare programs and cut capital requirements for business loans. Still, without ending protests, stimulus measures feel like fighting a kitchen fire with a brass succulent mister. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">That wasn't yesterday's only scary news</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Halloween celebrations were substantially less chipper this year in Hong Kong's Lan Kwai Fong nightlife district. Tens of thousands of protesters flouted a new ban on facial coverings and <a href="https://apnews.com/080c53f88d7449a0964e42ea948c89a3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">turned out</a> in full Guy Fawkes force, leading to an hours-long standoff with police.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The NYT </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/31/world/asia/hong-kong-halloween.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sets the scene</a></span><span>: "Later in the evening, with the area blocked off, a reveler dressed as Snow White could be seen coughing in the tear gas as tourists took selfies."</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Chinese leaders were sequestered behind closed doors this week for the Communist Party's secretive Central Committee plenary. One item on the agenda? Figure out how to juice China's flagging economy.</p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/apple-tv-launches-streaming-wars-heat?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Apple + TV = Apple TV+
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l44QrV0bFfDkhjD8Y/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l44QrV0bFfDkhjD8Y/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">November means watching male colleagues slowly morph into Hagrid and the official launch of the streaming wars. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">First up? After years of prep and spending $1 billion on just the first year of programming, Apple TV+ <a href="https://apnews.com/165d8109c0c0444192c49f9880ceca5d?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">is now live</a> for $4.99/month.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Don't let the price fool you</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">$15 million-per-episode <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2019/10/31/20936686/apple-tv-plus-morning-show-see-mankind-dickinson-price-netflix-disney-streaming?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">production costs</a> of series like <em>The Morning Show</em> and <em>See </em>rival those during the final season of <em>Game of Thrones</em>. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Why so pricey?</strong></span><span> A-listers like Jennifer Aniston, Reese Witherspoon, and Steve Carell don't come in value packs like Chewy bars. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/232/money-bag_1f4b0.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""> ≠ <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/google/223/grinning-face-with-star-eyes_1f929.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt="">, and early releases have <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/30/arts/television/the-morning-show-apple.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">mixed reviews</a>. However, with content from Oprah, Steven Spielberg, J.J. Abrams, and Octavia Spencer still to come, this could be a <em>Parks and Rec</em> Season 1-esque start. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Because what Apple lacks in early titles, </strong>it might make up for in established customer relationships. The company's offering promotions like a year of "free" streaming with Apple purchases.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>rival service Disney+ goes live in 11 days.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
E-CIGARETTE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/altria-writes-juul-investment?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Altria Gets Hit in the Family Juuls
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Altria’s investment in Juul is going about as well as your contribution to your friend’s wax throwing venture. Yesterday, the tobacco giant said it's taking a <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-altria-group-results/altria-takes-4-5-billion-charge-as-juul-investment-sours-amid-vaping-backlash-idUSKBN1XA1NG?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$4.5 billion writedown</a> of its investment in the e-cigarette leader. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Altria now pegs Juul at about a $24 billion valuation. The company paid $12.8 billion for a 35% stake in Juul last December. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Fidelity </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-10-30/fidelity-fund-slashes-value-of-its-juul-labs-stake-by-almost-50?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cut</a></span><span> the value of its own stake in Juul by almost 50% Wednesday. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory:</strong> This one would take longer than <em>The Two Towers</em>. Juul is dealing with a) a possible FDA ban on flavored e-cigarettes that would affect more than 80% of Juul's U.S. sales b) city and state bans already in effect and c) an outbreak of vaping-related illnesses and deaths. It’s tried to respond by...</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/17/juul-removes-sweet-flavors-stores-curb-underage-use?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Suspending</a></span><span> online sales of some flavored products last month. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Hiring a new CEO in September who </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/29/juul-ousts-executives-names-new-cfo-amid-shakeup-at-the-embattled-e-cigarette-company.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">began revamping</a></span><span> the c-suite earlier this week. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ While we’re here: </strong>Altria announced it will expand iQOS, its tobacco-heating device, to Richmond, VA. It was previously only available in Atlanta.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPONSORED BY REVTOWN
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Guy Climbs Cliff in Jeans
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Revtown" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcyNTU0MTMyLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">He climbs. He climbs in his jeans. <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Jeans so comfortable</a> that as he swings his leg to the next hold, his mind isn’t on the rock beneath his fingers<span>—</span>it’s on the denim hugging his calves. <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Jeans so stylish</a> that he felt no need to bring a change of clothes for his post-climbing date. His friends watch him climb<span>—</span><em>wearing jeans<span>—</span></em>and their only thought is, “Why don’t I look that good when I climb cliffs?” Now, someone calls to him from below: “Who makes your jeans, you handsome climber?” And our denim-clad hero whispers, “<strong style="color:#000">Revtown</strong>.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The word echoes through the desert canyon. <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Revtown</em></a>. The athletic jeans by the former Under Armour execs. <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Revtown</em></a>. The jeans of yoga pants and football uniforms. <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Revtown</em></a>. The only skinny, tapered jeans in which you can <em>scale a freakin’ mountain</em>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The best <a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">jeans</a> in the world.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://revtownusa.com/?utm_source=Morning%20Brew&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MorningBrew_October30" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Climb your cliff in Revtown jeans</a>.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
BEVERAGE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/utah-lifts-alcohol-limits-beer-4?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
There's a Foam Party at the Moab Brewery
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="A photograph of the Delicate Arch stone formation in Utah " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MTc4L2FfcGhvdG9ncmFwaF9vZl90aGVfZGVsaWNhdGVfYXJjaF9zdG9uZV9mb3JtYXRpb25faW5fdXRhaC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Palacemusic, Delicate arch sunset, CC BY-SA 3.0</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Today, <a href="https://fox13now.com/2019/10/29/empty-store-shelves-across-utah-as-3-2-beer-disappears-to-make-room-for-heavier-brews/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">alcohol limits</a> on beer sold in Utah grocery stores, convenience stories, and bars will be raised from 3.2% to 4% alcohol by weight (which is equivalent to 5% alcohol by volume). </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">This is a long time coming. </strong>Lighter beer limits were set by Congress during the Prohibition era, but most states have since raised the threshold to accommodate your increasing thirst for an 11.4% quintuple IPA. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">For smaller brewers…</strong></span><span>the transition has been a logistical "</span><span><a href="https://www.ksl.com/article/46637803/utah-brewers-say-transitioning-to-stronger-beer-is-a-logistical-nightmare?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nightmare</a></span><span>." Try switching up your entire branding and packaging with just seven months' notice.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">For larger brewers...</strong></span><span>it's a marketing opportunity. On Wednesday, Budweiser called in the Clydesdales to hold a </span><span><a href="https://kutv.com/news/local/budweiser-clydesdales-coming-to-utah-to-hold-halloween-funeral-for-32-beer?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">mock funeral</a></span><span> for 3.2% beer. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>"In Utah, the state's predominant religious faith, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, teaches abstinence from alcohol, and strict liquor laws continue to hold sway," <a href="https://apnews.com/f84b8e5af2e74e5b8b6647dc9a324251?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">writes the AP</a>. But lawmakers and industry boosters reached a <a href="https://www.ksl.com/article/46511237/utah-lawmakers-pass-bill-to-allow-stronger-beer-to-be-sold-in-grocery-convenience-stores?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">compromise</a> to raise the limit in March. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Pop quiz: </strong>There is now only one state left with 3.2% beer. What is it? (Answer at bottom.)</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
QUIZ
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/brews-weekly-news-quiz-november-1?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Double Quizzing
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<img alt="Nationals fan " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcyNTM4MDM0LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Patrick Smith/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">No longer accepts political ads. Worse reviews than Peter Luger. Now at 1.5x speed. It's the Brew's Weekly News Quiz. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. <strong style="color:#000">Fill in the blanks: </strong>French luxury conglomerate _____ has <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/27/lvmh-eyeing-tiffany-takeover?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">made an offer</a> to buy ______, a NYC-based jeweler. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">2. What is the colloquial name for Saudi Arabia’s Future Investment Initiative conference <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/28/davos-desert-take-three?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">held this week</a>? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">3. Chinese President Xi Jinping <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2019/10/28/president-xi-wants-china-world-leader-blockchain?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">urged</a> his country to take the lead in which technology? </p>
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Blockchain</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Mars colonization</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Plant-based meat </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Facial recognition</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Email newsletters</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">4. Which country’s president said it would <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/30/apec-cop25-canceled-no-literally?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">no longer host</a> two major international conferences as it confronts massive protests? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">5. In Belleville, IL, it is <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/30/halloweenrelated-laws-arebizarre?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">illegal</a> for anyone older than 12 to participate in what activity? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><sup class="sub-text"><em><strong style="color:#000">Answers: </strong>1. LVMH, Tiffany 2. Davos in the Desert, 3. Blockchain 4. Chile 5. Trick-or-treating</em></sup></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">76 points. </strong>How it works: You go up 5-0, 40-love in the first set, then lose every single point thereafter in the set (29 points). Your opponent then wins the next set (24 points) and goes up 5-0, 40-love on you in the third set (23 points). You then storm back to win all the remaining points. What. A. Comeback. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Source: <a href="https://www.npr.org/templates/transcript/transcript.php?storyId=480617338&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">NPR</a> </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Beer trivia answer: </strong>Minnesota is now the only state left with a 3.2% alcohol limit on beer in grocery and convenience stores.</p>

width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcyNTU2MDM5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eAnthony Kwan/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFive months of sustained protests will do that. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAn international commerce hub, Hong Kong was already \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/31/business/hong-kong-economy/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efeeling\u003c/a\u003e the effects of the U.S.-China trade war and China's slowing economic growth. But months of anti-government protests compounded those problems, dragging the region's economy down 3.2% in the quarter spanning July to September. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLocal businesses are hurting. \u003c/strong\u003eProtesters have targeted and vandalized organizations they perceive as opposing their cause. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBottomless dim sum baskets aren't boosting restaurant attendance. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHotel occupancy dropped from 90%+ to around 66%. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eHK's Cathay Pacific Airways's inbound traffic \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Hong-Kong-protests/Protests-tip-Hong-Kong-into-official-recession-as-trade-war-stings?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enosedived\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e 38% in September.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThings won’t get better soon\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eEconomists \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/31/business/hong-kong-economy/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epredict\u003c/a\u003e Hong Kong will fall short of growth targets for the year and face negative GDP growth in 2020 or earlier. But even if protests ended tomorrow, the consequences could stretch long after.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eTake the yellow vest protests that ripped through France last holiday season. The worst impacts weren't \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-france-protests/worst-of-yellow-vest-economic-impact-in-france-yet-to-come-senate-idUSKCN1TS1RX?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eexpected\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e until the last few months of 2019 when supply chain and delayed tax bill disruptions finally hit. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn response, HK leader Carrie Lam has \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/hong-kong-protests-force-city-into-recession-with-no-recovery-in-sight-11572513397?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecommitted\u003c/a\u003e to billions in social welfare programs and cut capital requirements for business loans. Still, without ending protests, stimulus measures feel like fighting a kitchen fire with a brass succulent mister. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThat wasn't yesterday's only scary news\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHalloween celebrations were substantially less chipper this year in Hong Kong's Lan Kwai Fong nightlife district. Tens of thousands of protesters flouted a new ban on facial coverings and \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/080c53f88d7449a0964e42ea948c89a3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eturned out\u003c/a\u003e in full Guy Fawkes force, leading to an hours-long standoff with police.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eThe NYT \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/31/world/asia/hong-kong-halloween.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esets the scene\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e: \"Later in the evening, with the area blocked off, a reveler dressed as Snow White could be seen coughing in the tear gas as tourists took selfies.\"\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eChinese leaders were sequestered behind closed doors this week for the Communist Party's secretive Central Committee plenary. One item on the agenda? style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAltria’s investment in Juul is going about as well as your contribution to your friend’s wax throwing venture. Yesterday, the tobacco giant said it's taking a \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-altria-group-results/altria-takes-4-5-billion-charge-as-juul-investment-sours-amid-vaping-backlash-idUSKBN1XA1NG?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$4.5 billion writedown\u003c/a\u003e of its investment in the e-cigarette leader. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAltria now pegs Juul at about a $24 billion valuation. The company paid $12.8 billion for a 35% stake in Juul last December. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eFidelity \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-10-30/fidelity-fund-slashes-value-of-its-juul-labs-stake-by-almost-50?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecut\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e the value of its own stake in Juul by almost 50% Wednesday. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory:\u003c/strong\u003e This one would take longer than \u003cem\u003eThe Two Towers\u003c/em\u003e. Juul is dealing with a) a possible FDA ban on flavored e-cigarettes that would affect more than 80% of Juul's U.S. sales b) city and state bans already in effect and c) an outbreak of vaping-related illnesses and deaths. rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ealcohol limits\u003c/a\u003e on beer sold in Utah grocery stores, convenience stories, and bars will be raised from 3.2% to 4% alcohol by weight (which is equivalent to 5% alcohol by volume). \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThis is a long time coming. \u003c/strong\u003eLighter beer limits were set by Congress during the Prohibition era, but most states have since raised the threshold to accommodate your increasing thirst for an 11.4% quintuple IPA. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor smaller brewers…\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003ethe transition has been a logistical \"\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enightmare\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\" Try switching up your entire branding and packaging with just seven months' notice.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor larger brewers...\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eit's a marketing opportunity. On Wednesday, Budweiser called in the Clydesdales to hold a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://kutv.com/news/local/budweiser-clydesdales-coming-to-utah-to-hold-halloween-funeral-for-32-beer?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emock funeral\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e for 3.2% beer. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003e\"In Utah, the state's predominant religious faith, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, teaches abstinence from alcohol, and strict liquor laws continue to hold sway,\" \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/f84b8e5af2e74e5b8b6647dc9a324251?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewrites the AP\u003c/a\u003e.
